sentences.en: Alan was irritable, and very evidently in a nervy state.
sentences.cn: 艾伦很急躁，很明显他处于紧张不安的状态。

sentences.en: John liked him because he was a nervy guy and would go out and shoot anybody who John wanted him to shoot.
sentences.cn: 约翰喜欢他，因为他胆大，约翰想干掉谁他就会出门去一枪把那人干掉。

sentences.en: She was all tired and nervy.
Sometimes dad was nice to us, but sometimes he was bad-tempered and nervy.
sentences.cn: 爸爸有时对我们很好，但有时他脾气暴躁，焦虑不安。

sentences.en: The nervy feats of the mountaineers were lauded.
sentences.cn: 登山者有勇气的壮举受到赞美.

sentences.en: Why is it doctor that I am always so nervy, tense and ready to jump on anybody.
sentences.cn: 大夫,为什么我总是感到神经质 、 紧张、爱发脾气.

words.tran_cn: 神经的；紧张不安的；强健有力的
神经质；[心理] 神经过敏；紧张不安
有勇气的；易激动的；紧张不安的

trans.tran_cn: <英><俚>神经质的，紧张不安的，焦虑的，<美><俚>有勇气的
